# updateRecurrence(_:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Updates the recurrence interval.

## Declaration

```swift
func updateRecurrence(_ recurrence: DateComponents?, completionHandler completion: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func updateRecurrence(_ recurrence: DateComponents?) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **recurrence**: The new recurrence interval.
- **completion**: The block executed after the request is processed.



## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMTimerTrigger/recurrence] for a discussion of how the recurrence value is used.

## Using recurrence

- **recurrence**: The interval on which to repeat firing the trigger.
